ASSESSMENTS

The patient was found to have Anemia and Dr Seven and his staff diagnosed the condition and treated Ms Alice for Anemia during the 2 day stay at Community Health Hospitals. Ms Alice recovered from Anemia during the stay and is being discharged in a stable condition. If there is fever greater than 101.5 F or onset of chest pain/breathlessness the patient is advised to contact emergency.
